files.patch:
@@ -262,3 +262,3 @@ - *

The resulting channel will not be buffered; it will simply redirect - * its I/O operations to the given stream. Closing the channel will in - * turn cause the stream to be closed.

+ *

The resulting channel will be in blocking mode and will not be + * buffered; it will simply redirect its I/O operations to the given stream. + * Closing the channel will in turn cause the stream to be closed.

@@ -269,1 +269,1 @@ - * @return A new readable byte channel + * @return A new readable byte channel in blocking mode
